```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Load data and libraries

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(randomForest)

train <- read.csv("train.csv")
test <- read.csv("test.csv")

full <- bind_rows(train, test)

# Data Wrangling

str(full)
summary(full)
# Age has alot of missing values, so I'll look at replacing those first
hist(full$Age)
summary(full$Age)
# We'll replace the NA's with the mean age of 29.88
full$Age[is.na(full$Age)] <- 29.88

# Exploratory Analysis

hist(full$Age)
hist(full$Fare)
ggplot(full, aes(Embarked, Fare, fill=Embarked)) + geom_boxplot()

```
